scripts.dev:simple: concurrently -n app,renderer,billing,assets,effects,langgraph -c cyan,yellow,green,magenta,blue,red "cd app && pnpm dev" "cd renderer && pnpm dev" "cd billing-service && pnpm start:dev" "cd asset-service && uv run python -m asset_service" "cd video-effects-service && uv run python -m video_effects_service" "cd langgraph_server && uv run uvicorn langgraph_server.main:app --reload --port 8000"
